item.description:
Watch the Rugby World Cup quarter-finals in style @ The Green Briar in Brighton. The Green Briar is a fine Irish establishment that we have visited many times during the past several years, especially in the summer (they have a nice outdoor area out back). For more info and directions, see their web-site.
The Green Briar
Aside from screening RWC 2007, The Green Briar screens NFL, basketball, baseball etc. etc. so there's something for every sports fan @ this pub. But on this day it's International Rugby that will be the focus - that's why they're opening the pub up early!

The RWC game starts @ 9am, and like all sports players we'll need to warm up beforehand - will confirm the exact opening time of the pub for those that want to come in for an early warm-up... :)
Typically a rugby game runs 40 minutes each way/half, with approx. 10 minutes between the 2 halves of the game, so the game should be over by 11am.
item.name: Rugby World Cup 2007 - Quarter Final Game 3
